mapper.select:
select id, code, name, to_char(crt_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host, is_use from zz_code_meeting_function where 1=1
and is_use = #{params.isUse}
and name like '%' || #{params.name} || '%'
order by code asc
select to_char(count(1)) cnt from zz_code_meeting_function where 1=1 and (name = #{params.name} or code = #{params.code})
select id, code, name, to_char(crt_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host, is_use from zz_code_meeting_function where 1=1 and code in (${codes}) order by code asc
mapper.insert: insert into zz_code_meeting_function (id, code, name, crt_time, crt_user, crt_name, crt_host ) values ( #{params.id}, #{params.code}, #{params.name}, sysdate, #{params.crtUser}, #{params.crtName}, #{params.crtHost} )
